en.title: Preventing Hairballs in Cats: Care Methods and Recommended Solutions
en.content:
Cats swallow hair during grooming, which can accumulate in the stomach and form hairballs that are then vomited up. Long-haired cats require extra attention.

Symptoms of Hairball Problems

While vomiting up hairballs is a normal behavior, frequent vomiting, attempting to vomit without success, loss of appetite, or persistent constipation may indicate that a hairball condition is progressing.

Prevention Methods

Regular Brushing

This is the most effective prevention method. By removing loose fur, you can reduce the amount of hair your cat swallows.

Hairball Control Food

Foods formulated with higher fiber content for hairball care help promote the passage of swallowed hair through the digestive system.

Cat Grass

Eating cat grass can help stimulate the expulsion of hairballs.

zh.title: 猫咪毛球症预防：毛球护理方法和推荐对策
zh.content:
猫咪在梳理毛发时会吞入毛发，这些毛发在胃中积聚形成毛球后会被吐出。长毛猫需要特别注意。

毛球症的症状

吐出毛球本身是正常行为，但如果频繁呕吐、想吐却吐不出来、食欲下降、持续便秘，则可能表明毛球症正在加重。

预防方法

定期梳毛

这是最有效的预防方法。通过去除浮毛，可以减少猫咪吞入的毛发量。

化毛猫粮

含有较多膳食纤维的化毛猫粮有助于促进吞入毛发的排出。

猫草

食用猫草可以促进毛球的排出。
